img_above_text:
![Wukong UpperHollow 33.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a2/Wukong_UpperHollow_33.jpg)
The first time you can find the Venom Daoist, he'll be hiding in the Upper Hollow of the major Webbed Hollow region. You can find it by circling the first area to the right, dropping down a hole to a slightly lower level, and fighting your way through tunnels full of hanging cocoons to reach the Pools of Shattered Jade Shrine.
img_below_text:
The Venom Daoist will be hiding in a large cocoon just past the shrine in a large darkened room. You'll need to break him out of the cocoon, and then defeat this boss (attacking his back to destroy his extra hands will deal major damage and can end the fight early).
Once defeated, he'll vow revenge and flee, and you won't see him again until escaping the Webbed Hollow.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong UpperHollow 33.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a2/Wukong_UpperHollow_33.jpg)
The first time you can find the Venom Daoist, he'll be hiding in the Upper Hollow of the major Webbed Hollow region. You can find it by circling the first area to the right, dropping down a hole to a slightly lower level, and fighting your way through tunnels full of hanging cocoons to reach the Pools of Shattered Jade Shrine."
        - Following Text: "The Venom Daoist will be hiding in a large cocoon just past the shrine in a large darkened room. You'll need to break him out of the cocoon, and then defeat this boss (attacking his back to destroy his extra hands will deal major damage and can end the fight early).
Once defeated, he'll vow revenge and flee, and you won't see him again until escaping the Webbed Hollow."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from *Black Myth: Wukong* where the player character, Wukong, stands in a dark, web-filled cavern with a fiery staff, preparing to confront the Venom Daoist. The environment features hanging cocoons and an ominous atmosphere, aligning with the narrative of locating the boss in the Webbed Hollow region. The caption hints at an impending encounter, emphasizing the tension and significance of this moment in the game.
